OrgName: LDiscovery, LLC, its DBAs AlphaLit, Flash Data Solutions, LLC, Turnstone Solutions, CredenceCorp, CopySecure and its wholly-owned subsidiary Renew Data Corp.
activities: We process data into searchable database form and host that data for review by counsel before counsel produces that data on behalf of counsel's client in response to a discovery demand in civil litigation, a legislative or judicial subpoena,or other legal process
eucountries: France, Germany, Greece, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: LDiscovery will assure compliance with the Safe Harbor Principles by committing to investigate and attempt to resolve complaints regarding violations of this privacy policy directly with the complainant and in the event that the complaint cannot be resolved by LDiscovery internally, the complaint may be submitted for dispute resolution to BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints.
